articles.title: Bruce Willis’s ‘worst performance’ award from Razzies show revoked after diagnosis - The Guardian
articles.description: Razzies initial joke in response to announcement of the actor’s aphasia condition was not well received
articles.content:
The organizers of the Razzies parody awards show have rescinded Bruce Williss 2021 award in light of the actors recently disclosed aphasia diagnosis.
The annual awards, which recognize the worst fil… [+2327 chars]
